title: how to thrift like a pro + small business advice
itunes:title: how to thrift like a pro + small business advice
description:
Brooke and Danielle are joined by Mel Willis, creator and owner of Indigo Vintage!  The gals discuss fast fashion vs shopping sustainably, the best thrifting tips, starting a business, and picking yourself up when you are down.  The gals also share some exciting announcements involving Danielle’s new business venture!


Check out the business of the week, homebody! https://www.homebodyworld.com/ 


Check Out Mel Willis: https://www.instagram.com/melwillisvtg/ 
Check Out Indigo Vintage: http://www.indigovtg.com 
Check Out Indigo Vintage on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/indigovtg/ 

Gals On The Go MERCH https://shop.podcastone.com/collections/gals-on-the-go 

Danielle’s Planner!!!  https://doingwelldaily.com/ 

Gals On The Go Instagram https://www.instagram.com/galsonthegopodcast/ 

Brooke’s Youtube Channel https://www.youtube.com/brookemiccio 
Brooke’s Instagram https://www.instagram.com/brookemiccio/ 

Danielle’s Youtube Channel https://www.youtube.com/c/daniellecarolan 
Danielle’s Instagram https://www.instagram.com/daniellecarolan/


GIVEAWAY: 
Giving away 2 x $250 Visa gift cards!
Follow @galsonthegopodcast
Follow @daniellecarolan
follow @brookemiccio 
Ends next Wednesday December 11:59PM
